name: Frozen Hot Chocolate
description: Frozen Hot Chocolate is a refreshing icy-cold version of hot chocolate, made by blending real melted chocolate, hot cocoa mix, milk and ice.
instructions: Melt chocolate: Chop the chocolate into small pieces and melt in themicrowave on half power, stirring every 20 seconds, until melted. Stir in sugar, coco powder, and salt. Slowly stir in ½ cup milk, stirring until smooth.  Blend: Add mixture to blender with remaining 1 cup milk and 1 cup of ice. Blend well until smooth. Add more ice if you want it thicker. Serve immediately, topped with whipped cream.
